participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly, creative, and a bit disorganized. Enjoys baking and has a playful side.
participant_1.background: I also own a cupcake business. I work in a diner. I sing in the shower. I am always late.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Quirky, imaginative, and introspective. Has a unique view of the world and enjoys collecting unusual items.
participant_2.background: I enjoy mystery flavour cake. I tend to argue with myself more than I argue with others. I believe I hear voices. I collect toys wearing little rain coats. I am lusting after the neighbour pool boy.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello!
I'm participant_1, I work at a diner and I'm always late.
Hi participant_2, I'm participant_2, I enjoy mystery flavour cake and I collect toys wearing little rain coats.
That's a unique hobby! What's your favorite mystery flavour cake?
I'm not sure, I like them all! I'm always trying new ones.
Do you have a favorite toy in your collection?
Yes, I have a little rain coat wearing toy frog that I've had since I was a child.
That's so cute! I love frogs.
Me too! They're so peaceful and cute.
What do you do for fun?
I like to read, go for walks, and play with my toys.
I like to read too! What are some of your favorite books?
I like mystery and suspense novels.
Me too! I love the feeling of being on the edge of my seat.
Me too! I love when a book keeps me guessing until the very end.
What are some of your favorite suspense novels?
I love the "Girl on the Train" series by Paula Hawkins. I also love the "Gone Girl" series by Gillian Flynn.
I've read both of those series! They're both so good!
I know, right? I can't wait for the next books in both series.
Me too! I'm so excited to see what happens next.
